title: Moving from Windows to Linux EBOOK-SHAREGO.rar
description:
Moving from Windows to Linux EBOOK-SHAREGO
[IMG]http://i269.photobucket.com/albums/jj44/downarchive2/member3/untitled-92.jpg[/IMG]
Charles River Media Publisher |  1 Edition | English | CHM | 590 pages 
Most computer users utilize the Windows operating system, today, however, many experienced computer users are either moving to Linux or would like the option. One factor holding many people back is the fear of learning a new operating system and applications. This book uses a friendly, step-by-step style to walk the user through the transition from Windows to Linux. It leverages what you know as an experienced Windows user, and applies that knowledge to Linux. Concepts in Linux are related to similar concepts in Windows, allowing you to draw on what you already know to come up to speed with Linux. After reading through Moving From Windows to Linux any knowledgeable user of Windows will be able to set up, maintain, and utilize all aspects of a Linux PC quickly and easily.
